actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that housing benefits available to a veteran, under title 38 of the United States Code, shall not be considered in determining, under title 5 of the Housing Act of 1949, whether such veteran is able to obtain credit for housing from sources other than the Farmers Home Administration.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to provide that specified veterans' housing benefits shall not be considered in determining the eligibility of veterans for housing financing from sources other than the Farmers Home Administration.

titles.title: A bill to provide that housing benefits available to a veteran, under title 38 of the United States Code, shall not be considered in determining, under title 5 of the Housing Act of 1949, whether such veteran is able to obtain credit for housing from sources other than the Farmers Home Administration.
